title: Buttons
intro: Buttons are used to indicate and initiate actions. They are used in many other components.

primary.description: The primary button should be used for the primary record actions on the page and is generally found in the upper right quadrant of the actionable area, usually the tool bar, i.e. “Save”.

secondary.description: The secondary button should be used for any secondary, but important, actions on the page and is generally found in the upper right quadrant of the actionable area besides the “Save” primary button. Examples include “Add” in a popover or “Invite” in Team Management.

upload.description: Input Type File needs special markup to get skinned in a proper way. You can use this with all available btn modifier classes

link.description: Button Link is to be styled as a link as it's a tertiary action. Use Button to denote discard updates to the current form or action and return to the immediate previous state/page/form. Cancel is NOT 'Clear' but the end result is the same in that any updates to the current page are discarded
